**Financial Transparency**
--------------------------

The City of Meadows Place believes accountability to our residents can be met through meaningful transparency.

The following charts display the **total revenue and expenditures** for the City as well as the per capita revenue and expenditures for the past 5 fiscal years.  The City’s fiscal year begins October 1 and ends the following year on September 30.

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2019-2023-Total-Revenue-and-Expenditures-1.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2019-2023-Total-Revenue-and-Expenditures-1.png)

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2019-2023-Revenue-and-Expenditures-per-Capita-1.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2019-2023-Revenue-and-Expenditures-per-Capita-1.png)

The 2023-2024 Fiscal Year, ending September 2024 is the most recently audited financial year.

The following reports and charts are from 2023-2024:

##### ***[2023-2024 Annual Financial Report, ending September 30, 2024](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/City-of-Meadows-Place-2024.pdf)***

##### 

[**FYE 2024 Adopted Budget**](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2024-Adopted-Budget-Document-with-TOC-08.17.2023.pdf) **[2024 Adopted Budget Charts](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2024-Adopted-Budget-Charts-08.15.2023.pdf)**

**[FYE 2024 EDC Adopted Budget](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/EDC-FY-2023-2024-Adopted-Budget.pdf)**

The following summary data is from the 2022-2023 audited Financial Report, ending September 30, 2023.

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Revenue-from-Services.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Revenue-from-Services.png)

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Expenses-by-Department.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Expenses-by-Department.png)

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Revenue-from-Services-1.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2022-2023-Revenue-from-Services-1.png)

[![](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2023-Fiscal-Year-Revenues-and-Expenses.png)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2023-Fiscal-Year-Revenues-and-Expenses.png)

---

#### [Click here to View Prior Audited Financial Reports and Adopted Budgets](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/departments/finance/financial-reports/)
